I have got a little help but looking for more.  I now there out there.

Lee

Hi Lee,

Sorry to interrupt your thread, but wanted to share:

I have 560+ T206 and zero Cycle 460s at the moment.  

I find that very interesting.  I had a Cobb red portrait, but sold it and didn't realize I had no other example.

Must be tougher than I thought.  Nice accomplishment accumulating as many as you have!

I'm still gonna beat you in our Full Count fantasy league though.  sorry.  :)


Rob
